version.description: Show only updates regarding the current architecture, while keeping the ability to display full logs. Application support directory is no longer required and made obsolete. Fix some classes not default to Java 1.5. Fix JSudo bug. Improved command line interface. Other fixes and updates.
Fix relaunch command error. Fix namespace image collision.

Support of tar, tar.gz, tar.bz2 files and packages. Versioning is independent of the main application. Default architecture "any" for versions with missing "arch" entry. Automatic hide dot files under Windows.

Mirrors Support.

WARNING: Application restart might fail to do so, due to updates of the Jupidator library. You can safely ignore this problem.
Administrator rights are supported. Stability improvements were made.
Checksumming support of downloaded files. Improved support of "any" tag. Introduced support of "all" tag. Fixed issues when ignoring versions. Self-update of jupidator support.

Support was added for the "exec" element to execute native commands, "wait" to pause the deployer, and "kill" to kill native applications. The updater now could be a stand alone application; it does not longer the updated appli cation to be written in Java. The console is supported as a valid UI in headless environments. "About" information was added in the Swing GUI. The developer can set properties in UI elements. The documentation was improved. Translations were added in Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese.
